title: Record of Enrollment by Race
description: This document records the details of an enrollment by race

CountyEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the county

LEAEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the LEA

SchoolEntityID.description: The unique identifier for the school

Subgroup.description: The unique identifier of the subgroup

Female.description: The number of female students in the subgroup

Male.description: The number of male students in the subgroup

GenderTotal.description: The total number of students in the subgroup

White.description: The number of white students in the subgroup

Black.description: The number of black students in the subgroup

Hispanic.description: The number of hispanic students in the subgroup

Asian.description: The number of asian students in the subgroup

NativeAmerican.description: The number of native american students in the subgroup

PacificIslander.description: The number of pacific islander students in the subgroup

MultipleRaces.description: The number of students of more than one race

MissingEthnicity.description: The number of students with missing ethnicity

Total.description: The total number of students in the subgroup
